backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, roles, lawyer directory data, and bookings with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten file summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining an OKLCH color theme with light/dark variables and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining public, authenticated, and role-protected routes with layouts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard redirecting unauthenticated users to home and showing a loader during Internet Identity init.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based guard that redirects users without matching roles and displays an Access Denied fallback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Authenticated layout that ensures user profile and onboarding completion before rendering content.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public-facing layout with header, footer, and routed main content area.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicFooter: Footer with navigation links for clients, lawyers, and company info plus dynamic copyright text.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicHeader: Responsive header with navigation links and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, onboarding, lawyer search, dashboards, bookings, and status updates using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for theming and light/dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/auth/OnboardingRole.t: Role selection page that loads the user profile, handles onboarding completion, and routes to the appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a profile setup form, handles saving the user's name, and redirects if a profile already exists.
frontend/src/pages/booking/BookConsultat: Lets users select a lawyer, choose a date and time, and book a consultation with validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/chat/Chat.tsx: Shows a placeholder chat interface indicating messaging features are coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ClientDashb: Displays client dashboard with upcoming consultations, saved lawyers, and tabbed sections for chat, payments, and documents.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/LawyerDashb: Shows lawyer dashboard with booking stats, earnings, ratings, and profile-related metrics.
frontend/src/pages/directory/FindLawyers: Provides a searchable and filterable directory of lawyers sorted by status and rating.
Form page allowing authenticated users to create a lawyer profile with fields for bio, expertise, languages, and credentials. Handles validation, dynamic list fields, and submission via createProfile mutation.
frontend/src/pages/lawyers/LawyerProfile: Displays a lawyerâ€™s full profile with reviews, ratings, and booking history checks. Supports submitting new reviews and navigating back to the directory.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/Home.tsx: Marketing homepage with hero, feature explanations, and calls to action for finding lawyers or joining as one. Uses cards and visuals to present how the platform works.
frontend/src/pages/subscriptions/ClientP: Shows subscription tiers for clients with pricing and feature lists. Provides buttons for starting or selecting a plan.
frontend/src/pages/subscriptions/LawyerP: Displays subscription plans for lawyers, detailing features for Basic and Pro tiers. Includes pricing and upgrade or signup actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme tokens for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current state, features, versioning, and required images for the LawConnect SaaS platform.
